lead_paragraph: Mr. Wagner, a third-generation grape farmer, opened a successful winery in the Finger Lakes region of New York in 1979.
snippet: Mr. Wagner, a third-generation grape farmer, opened a successful winery in the Finger Lakes region of New York in 1979.

headline.main: Stanley Wagner, New York Winery Owner, Dies at 83
headline.seo: Stanley Wagner, New York Winery Owner, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline:
Stanley Wagner, 83, Vintner;
A Pioneer of Upstate Wine
